summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2730 for the improvement of Queen Anne Boulevard as established by Ordinance No. 16790, from McGraw Street and Bigelow Avenue to McGraw Street and Nob Hill Avenue all in the City of Seattle, by construction watermains therein together with all appurtenance necessary for the proper water service and fire protection of said district, under Ordinance No. 32188, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
